```lisp
(:action choose ; Choose an item and add it to the player's inventory
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?loc - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?loc) (at ?item ?loc))
    :effect (and (inventory ?p ?item) (not (at ?item ?loc)))
)

(:action establish ; Establish an entity and update its status
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?entity - entity ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?agent ?location) (at ?entity ?location) (not (established ?entity ?location)))
    :effect (established ?entity ?location)
)

(:action plant ; Plant an entity using a container and substance
    :parameters (?p - player ?e - entity ?c - container ?s - substance)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?e) (inventory ?p ?c) (inventory ?p ?s))
    :effect (and (not (inventory ?p ?e)) (planted ?e ?c ?s))
)

(:action modify ; Modify an entity's state and update its location or status
    :parameters (?actor - agent ?entity - entity ?loc1 - location ?loc2 - location)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?loc1) (at ?entity ?loc1) (established ?entity ?loc1) (inventory ?actor ?entity))
    :effect (and (not (at ?entity ?loc1)) (at ?entity ?loc2))
)
```
